intro_only_event_multi_aprilfool_intro_2: Sync pairs of Pasio! Hear my words!

You’ll all be participating in battles in which the
only Pokémon move you can use is Metronome!
What?! But why?

Don’t you understand? Your luck is also
your power!

If you can’t take advantage of opportunities at the
right moments, you can’t become a top-notch
sync pair!
I agree to those terms.

In order to win, sometimes you need to take
big risks.

In times like that, if you can’t trust your own luck,
you won’t be able to win a match you ought to.
Hmm, that’s true!
But... Pokémon that can use Metronome...

No need to fret! I’ve prepared the Pokémon you’ll
need for your battles.

Clefairy and Togepi are on standby, as
rental Pokémon!
Whoa! Rental Pokémon!
Good job! You know what you’re doing!

I’ll put you all on either the Clefairy team or the
Togepi team, and you’ll battle one another!
Apparently, Togepi will share good luck...

It’s also said that happiness will come to those
who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing!

So the competition starts when we learn what
Pokémon we’re partnered with?
Now this should be fun! I’m getting excited, hey!
OK then! I’m gonna test my luck with Metronome!
